attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2008-1513

Date: 2008-09-02

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary

of Rodney Monette, former Interim Comptroller General of Canada,

as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($203,600 ‑ $239,600), for the period commencing April 1, 2008 and terminating April 30, 2008.


Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Susan Cartwright, former Foreign and Defence Policy Advisor to the Prime Minister and Deputy Secretary to the Cabinet, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($177,000 ‑ $208,300), for the period commencing April 1, 2008 and terminating June 15, 2008.


Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Keith Coulter, former Commissioner of Corrections, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($203,600 ‑ $239,600), for the period commencing April 1, 2008 and terminating June 27, 2008.


Her Excellency the Governor General in Council,

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Ivan P. Fellegi, former Chief Statistician of Canada, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($203,600 ‑ $239,600), for the period commencing April 1, 2008 and terminating June 13, 2008.

on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Kathleen O'Hara, former Senior Associate Deputy Minister of Human Resources and Social Development, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($203,600 ‑ $239,600), for the period commencing April 1, 2008 and terminating August 7, 2008.
